<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.TicketAccessUtil</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Script utility for Ticket Access table</description><name>TicketAccessUtil</name><script><![CDATA[var TicketAccessUtil = Class.create();
TicketAccessUtil.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

	// Returns a filter removing any ritm/task
	// the user does not have access to
	// user can see any restricted ritm/task
	// they requested or on the watch list
    ritmTaskFilter: function(isTask) {
        var task = isTask != null ? isTask : this.getParameter('sysparm_isTask');
        var filter = '';

        var catalog = new GlideRecord('sc_catalog');
        catalog.addActiveQuery();
        catalog.query();

        while (catalog.next()) {
            var grTA = new GlideRecord('u_ticket_access');
            grTA.addQuery('u_catalog', catalog.getUniqueValue());
            grTA.orderByDesc('u_category');
            grTA.query();

            while (grTA.next()) {
                var groups = grTA.getDisplayValue('u_groups').split(',');
                var roles = grTA.getDisplayValue('u_roles').split(',');

                var hasAccess = false;

                groups.forEach(function(group) {
                    if (gs.getUser().isMemberOf(group) && group != '') {
                        hasAccess = true;
                    }
                });

                roles.forEach(function(role) {
                    if (gs.getUser().hasRole(role) && role != '') {
                        hasAccess = true;
                    }
                });

                // Filter out any categories the user does not have access to
                if (grTA.u_category != '') {
                    if (!hasAccess) {
                        if (task) {
                            filter += 'cat_item.category!=' + grTA.u_category + '^ORrequest_item.requested_forDYNAMIC90d1921e5f510100a9ad2572f2b477fe^ORwatch_listDYNAMIC90d1921e5f510100a9ad2572f2b477fe^';
                        } else {
                            filter += 'cat_item.category!=' + grTA.u_category + '^ORrequested_forDYNAMIC90d1921e5f510100a9ad2572f2b477fe^ORwatch_listDYNAMIC90d1921e5f510100a9ad2572f2b477fe^';
                        }
                    }
                } else {
                    // Skip ticket access records where no groups or roles are defined
                    if (groups == '' && roles == '') {
                        // skip
                    } else if (!hasAccess) {
                        if (task) {
                            filter += 'cat_item.sc_catalogsNOT' + grTA.u_catalog + '^ORrequest_item.requested_forDYNAMIC90d1921e5f510100a9ad2572f2b477fe^ORwatch_listDYNAMIC90d1921e5f510100a9ad2572f2b477fe^';
                        } else {
                            filter += 'cat_item.sc_catalogsNOT' + grTA.u_catalog +
                                '^ORrequested_forDYNAMIC90d1921e5f510100a9ad2572f2b477fe^ORwatch_listDYNAMIC90d1921e5f510100a9ad2572f2b477fe^';
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }

        return filter;
    },

    // Checks the Ticket Access table for
    // any records that contain a matching
    // catalog and category
    checkExistingCategory: function(catologue, categoria) {
        var catalog = catologue != null ? catologue : this.getParameter('sysparm_catalog');
        var category = categoria != null ? categoria : this.getParameter('sysparm_category');

        var ticketAccess = new GlideRecord('u_ticket_access');
        ticketAccess.addEncodedQuery('u_catalog=' + catalog + '^u_category=' + category);
        ticketAccess.query();

        if (ticketAccess.next()) {
            return true;
        }
        return false;
    },

    // Checks the Ticket Access table for
    // any records that contain a matching
    // catalog and no category
    checkExistingCatalog: function(catologue) {
        var catalog = catologue != null ? catologue : this.getParameter('sysparm_catalog');

        var ticketAccess = new GlideRecord('u_ticket_access');
        ticketAccess.addEncodedQuery('u_catalog=' + catalog + '^u_categoryISEMPTY');
        ticketAccess.query();

        if (ticketAccess.next()) {
            return true;
        }
        return false;
    },

    type: 'TicketAccessUtil'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>julian.gonzalez@cohesity.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-11-07 01:20:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>2a3ed8a2931e71106a8b345d6cba10bd</sys_id><sys_mod_count>22</sys_mod_count><sys_name>TicketAccessUtil</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2a3ed8a2931e71106a8b345d6cba10bd</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>julian.gonzalez@cohesity.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-11-07 19:08:11</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_671c97129712b110f87eba77f053af86
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>true</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sc_req_item</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Ticket Access Query Filter</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    var filter = '';

    var catalog = new GlideRecord('sc_catalog');
    catalog.addActiveQuery();
    catalog.query();

    while (catalog.next()) {
        var grTA = new GlideRecord('u_ticket_access');
        grTA.addQuery('u_catalog', catalog.getUniqueValue());
        grTA.orderByDesc('u_category');
        grTA.query();

        while (grTA.next()) {
            var groups = grTA.getDisplayValue('u_groups').split(',');
            var roles = grTA.getDisplayValue('u_roles').split(',');

            var hasAccess = false;

            groups.forEach(function(group) {
                if (gs.getUser().isMemberOf(group) && group != '') {
                    hasAccess = true;
                }
            });

            roles.forEach(function(role) {
                if (gs.getUser().hasRole(role) && role != '') {
                    hasAccess = true;
                }
            });

            // Filter out any categories the user does not have access to
            if (grTA.u_category != '') {
                // Check User is part of group or has role
                if (!hasAccess) {
                    filter += 'cat_item.category!=' + grTA.u_category + '^ORrequested_forDYNAMIC90d1921e5f510100a9ad2572f2b477fe^ORwatch_listDYNAMIC90d1921e5f510100a9ad2572f2b477fe^';
                }
            } else {
                // Add/Remove Acces to catalogs
                if (groups == '' && roles == '') {
                    filter += 'cat_item.sc_catalogsLIKE' + grTA.u_catalog +
                        '^ORrequested_forDYNAMIC90d1921e5f510100a9ad2572f2b477fe^ORwatch_listDYNAMIC90d1921e5f510100a9ad2572f2b477fe^';
                } else if (hasAccess) {
                    filter += 'cat_item.sc_catalogsLIKE' + grTA.u_catalog +
                        '^ORrequested_forDYNAMIC90d1921e5f510100a9ad2572f2b477fe^ORwatch_listDYNAMIC90d1921e5f510100a9ad2572f2b477fe^';
                }
            }
        }
    }

	current.addEncodedQuery(filter);

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>julian.gonzalez@cohesity.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-11-06 21:17:07</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>671c97129712b110f87eba77f053af86</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Ticket Access Query Filter</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_671c97129712b110f87eba77f053af86</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>julian.gonzalez@cohesity.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-11-07 00:58:31</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=671c97129712b110f87eba77f053af86"/></record_update>
